name: Cyber Surveillance Resistance
description: Defensive strategies against AI-driven surveillance programs and mass monitoring systems.

cards.title: Defensive Cybersecurity Against AI Surveillance
cards.description: Practical cybersecurity measures to counter AI-based tracking systems.
bulletpoints: Best practices for encrypting communications and securing devices.
Using open-source, privacy-focused operating systems and applications.
How to detect and remove AI surveillance software from personal devices.
cards.summaryText: Covers hardened comms, privacy OS stacks, and sweeps to purge AI surveillance implants.

cards.title: Avoiding Mass Data Collection Networks
cards.description: How AI aggregates personal data across multiple platforms and how to disrupt it.
bulletpoints: How social media and online platforms collect and analyze user data.
Using burner accounts, temporary email addresses, and anonymous browsing.
Understanding the limits and risks of data removal services.
cards.summaryText: Explains data aggregation pipelines, throwaway identity tactics, and realistic data removal limits.

cards.title: Defeating AI-Powered Psychological Manipulation
cards.description: Resisting AI-driven psychological profiling and social engineering tactics.
bulletpoints: How AI curates personalized disinformation campaigns.
Recognizing and neutralizing algorithmic influence over thoughts and emotions.
Disrupting targeted advertising and behavioral modification programs.
cards.summaryText: Shows how to spot AI-profiling psyops, counter algorithmic nudges, and jam targeted influence loops.
